name: Chaotic Relocate
description:
You're relocating your company but the truck driver forgot to close the doors!
You better hurry and drive to the new location with the truck but don't crash into other cars or items dropping of the truck.

You control the car behind the truck, but from the second perspective.
This means you're looking through the eyes of the truck driver. He's looking either in the left or right mirror, depending on the side he is driving on. Your car is only visible to you through his mirrors.

This game was made in 48h for the GMTK Jam 2020.
